mapper.sql:
select id, name, parent_id, order_num, url, type, hide,
nvl(perms,'') as perms,
ifnull(perms,'') as perms,
target, icon,module_codes, create_by, create_time from sys_menu

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide, IFNULL(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time FROM(SELECT a.*,SUBSTRING_INDEX( SUBSTRING_INDEX( a.module_codes, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',',- 1 ) AS cs FROM sys_menu a JOIN sys_index b ON b.help_topic_id < ( LENGTH( a.module_codes ) - LENGTH( REPLACE ( a.module_codes, ',', '' ) ) + 1)) AS m

select m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide, nvl(m.perms,'') AS perms,m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from (SELECT distinct REGEXP_SUBSTR(t.module_codes, '[^,]+', 1, level) as cs,t.* from sys_menu t connect by level <= regexp_count(t.module_codes, ',') + 1 ) m
mapper.select:
select m.id as id, m.name as name, m.parent_id as parentId, m.order_num as orderNum, m.url as url, m.type as type, m.hide as hide, m.target as target,m.module_codes as moduleCodes, m.icon as icon,
nvl(m.perms,'') as perms,
ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms,
rm.name as parentName from sys_menu as m LEFT JOIN (SELECT id,name FROM sys_menu) AS rm ON m.parent_id = rm.id WHERE m.id = #{menuId}
where type != 2 order by order_num asc
where parent_id = #{parentId} and sys_menu.hide = 0 order by order_num asc
select perms from sys_role_menu rel inner join sys_menu m on rel.menu_id = m.id where perms IS NOT NULL AND perms != '' AND rel.role_id = #{roleId}
select concat(m.id, nvl(m.perms,'') ifnull(m.perms,'') ) as perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where rm.role_id = #{roleId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide,
nvl(m.perms,'') as perms,
ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms,
m.target,m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.id where ur.user_id = #{userId}
AND m.name like '%,'||#{name}||',%' concat('%', #{name}, '%')
AND m.hide = #{hide}
order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.name, m.url, m.hide,
nvl(perms,'') as perms,
ifnull(perms,'') as perms,
m.module_codes,m.target, m.type, m.icon, m.order_num, m.create_time from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id LEFT JOIN sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.parent_id, m.order_num
